text.section:
Subject to subsection (c) of this section, this section applies to:
A truck that has a gross vehicle weight rating of 10,001 pounds or more; and
A truck/trailer or truck tractor/semitrailer or trailer combination that has a combined gross vehicle weight rating of 10,001 pounds or more.

While a vehicle subject to this section is being operated on a highway:
The driver may not allow a person to occupy the area of the vehicle primarily intended to carry cargo; and
A person may not occupy the area of the vehicle primarily intended to carry cargo.
